channel.title: Comments on: MySQL 5.6 GA – Replication Enhancements
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: MySQL Replication – Multi-Threaded Slave just got a whole lot faster | InsideMySQL
item.dc:creator: MySQL Replication – Multi-Threaded Slave just got a whole lot faster | InsideMySQL
item.description: […] had 5 schemas then one event from each schema could be applied in parallel (this is described in MySQL 5.6 GA – Replication Enhancements). This approach delivered a much higher throughput on the slave but only if you were using multiple […]
item.content:encoded: […] had 5 schemas then one event from each schema could be applied in parallel (this is described in MySQL 5.6 GA – Replication Enhancements). This approach delivered a much higher throughput on the slave but only if you were using multiple […]

item.title: By: Allie
item.dc:creator: Allie
item.description: I'm totally loving this new release of mysql! The gtids make setting up a cluster so much easier.
item.content:encoded: I’m totally loving this new release of mysql! The gtids make setting up a cluster so much easier.
